name: Urban Hack Defense
description: Computer punks have never been more dangerous… In this sci-fi tower defense game you will be in charge of defending the metropolis of “CTOE” from a variety of harmful attacks. This metropolis is run and governed by a powerful technology infrastructure. You are in control of purchasing and strategically positioning defense mechanisms to avoid hackers from entering the premises of the city. Once a wave of attackers is destroyed, you will have to bump up your safety with more and stronger defenses, as attackers will also come back stronger and in larger quantities.
